docs.snippet: About 60 people died and several inmates escaped on Monday during a prison riot involving drug gangs in Manaus, Brazil, the local authorities said....

docs.snippet: More airlines are anticipating weather delays and allowing customers to change their itineraries on the companies’ websites and from their smartphone apps....

headline.main: Airlines, Now More Proactive on Weather, Allow Fliers to Shift Own Travel Plans
headline.print_headline: Braving a Storm, but Not the Looming Line at the Airport

docs.snippet: Underground pockets of boiling water and steam in a northern New Mexico national preserve that represent the heart of an ancient collapsed volcano could get extra federal protection under a proposal by the National Park Service to limit or prevent...
docs.lead_paragraph: Underground pockets of boiling water and steam in a northern New Mexico national preserve that represent the heart of an ancient collapsed volcano could get extra federal protection under a proposal by the National Park Service to limit or prevent any negative effects from tapping geothermal energy on neighboring land.

headline.main: Protection Sought for New Mexico Park's Geothermal Deposits
headline.print_headline: Protection Sought for New Mexico Park's Geothermal Deposits
